post.author: Brendan
post.content:
Carlo Esposito

Executive Account Manager
Compu-Source Staffing Inc.
2200 Yonge St. Suite 1004
Toronto, ON
M4S 2C6

Mobile. 647.295.4948
Tel. 416.482.4009 ext. 230
Fax. 416.482.4093
Toll Free. 1.877.213.3301
carlo@staffingsuccess.com
www.staffingsuccess.com
-------------------------

JOB DESCRIPTION

Intermediate Developer  

The application is heavily dependent on an advanced Web based user interface that exposes our services to our customers. The current requirement for this position is to participate in the development team responsible for enhancements to the User Interface components of the system.

Reporting to the System Development Manager, your primary responsibilities will include:

Duties & Responsibilities

    * Contribute to the extension of the UI framework;
    * Develop new UI pages to support new application features;
    * Extend the UI implementation to support enhancements to existing features;
    * Develop and enhance common UI controls;
    * Correct UI defects;
    * Contribute to creation of an automated User Interface test framework;



Qualifications

    * Demonstrated experience (2+ years) in building ASP.NET server controls;
    * Demonstrated experience in implementing well structured, client oriented user interfaces;
    * Proficient in current Microsoft development tools (Visual Studio Version 2003 or greater);
    * Languages required: C#; JavaScript, HTML, CSS, XML.



Additional Skill areas:

    * Ability to work well in a team environment
    * Excellent communication skills
    * Academic background (BSc or MSc) in Computer Science or Computer Engineering preferably with a specialty in Human-Computer interaction;
    * Familiarity with AJAX UI techniques would be an asset
post.title: Intermediate Developer - ASP.NET, C#
